alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles; Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 3:34PM PDT until September 04 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: The National Weather Service in OXNARD has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Ventura County in southwestern California... Northwestern Los Angeles County in southwestern California... * Until 400 PM PDT. * At 333 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Santa Clarita, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Santa Clarita... and Castaic Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
